scripts.scrap: node src/Server\ Data/scrapServers.js && node src/Character\ Data/scrapMainPage.js && node src/Character\ Data/scrapSingle.js && node src/Item\ Data/scrapItems.js
scripts.full: npm run scrap && npm run update
scripts.history: node src/Bazaar\ History/scrapHistory.js && node src/Bazaar\ History/paginateHistory.js
scripts.updateHistory: npm run history && npm run statistics && ./automations/deployHistory.sh
